abstract.text: The Subscriber class manages the subscription to audio and video tracks from the Millicast platform.
Subscribes to a stream with options.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives stream stopped events
Checks whether the subscriber is currently subscribing to any media.
Connects and opens a websocket connection with the Millicast platform.  You must set valid credentials before using this method.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives rts remote tracks when they are available.

List all available rts remote audio tracks received so far.
Asynchronously query whether the subscriber is connected or not.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive stats reports.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives viewer count updates.
Stops the subscription process indicating to the streaming server that the subscriber
is no longer interested in receiving audio and video content.
After calling this method, the SDK automatically terminates the connection between
the subscriber and the streaming platform.

Asynchronously query whether the subscriber is currently subscribed to a stream or not.

connection.

Asynchronously query the currently set credentials.
